actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to condemn the Government of South Africa for invoking the state of emergency in certain magisterial districts in response to the anniversary of the 1976 Soweto uprising, and to demand an end to the state of emergency in South Africa.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that the Congress condemns the Government of South Africa for invoking the state of emergency in specified districts and demands an end to such emergency.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to condemn the Government of South Africa for invoking the state of emergency in certain magisterial districts in response to the anniversary of the 1976 Soweto uprising, and to demand an end to the state of emergency in South Africa.
